speedDown() - Method in class cannonGame.SpaceShip
Decreases space ship's speed in 2 times if it is more or equal to normal speed (it is normal or increased by "speed_up" bonus (through speedUp() method)).
speedUp() - Method in class cannonGame.SpaceShip
Increases space ship's speed in 2 times if it is less or equal to normal speed (it is normal or decreased by "speed_down" bonus (through speedDown() method)).
